info.name: Fur Affinity - EdgeDestroys V1.0 Theme
info.description: Quick edit of Dakata's Red Theme, simply for color. Browns and Teals.
info.additionalInfo: Just a theme I threw together edited from the red theme Dakata created. I still need to figure out how to remove/change the color of the light blue border for it to look 100% right but otherwise works fine.
